mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seat_table (res_idx, type, name, x, y, image, is_selected) VALUES (#{resIdx}, #{type}, #{name}, #{x}, #{y}, #{image}, #{isSelected})
INSERT INTO category (res_idx, category_addr, category_name, category_tag ) VALUES (#{resIdx}, #{categoryAddr} , #{categoryName}, #{categoryTag} )

INSERT INTO restaurant ( user_idx ,res_name, res_call, res_address1, res_address2, res_introduce, res_reserve_time, res_image1, res_image2, res_image3) VALUES (#{userIdx} ,#{resName}, #{resCall}, #{resAddress1}, #{resAddress2}, #{resIntroduce}, #{resReserveTime}, #{resImage1}, #{resImage2}, #{resImage3} )
mapper.update: UPDATE restaurant SET res_image1 = #{resImage1}, res_image2 = #{resImage2}, res_image3 = #{resImage3}, res_name = #{resName}, res_call = #{resCall}, res_address1 = #{resAddress1}, res_address2 = #{resAddress2}, res_introduce = #{resIntroduce}, res_reserve_time = #{resReserveTime} WHERE res_idx = #{resIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restaurant_time ( day, start_time, end_time ) VALUES ( #{day}, #{startTime} ,#{endTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT seat_id As seatId, res_idx AS resIdx, type, name, x, y, image, is_selected As isSelected FROM seat_table WHERE res_idx = #{resIdx}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM seat_table WHERE seat_id = #{seatId} AND res_idx = #{resIdx}
